# SITUACIONES EN LAS QUE ANOTA UN JUGADOR

```{r}
get_player_synergy <- function(player_id, season = "2023-24", season_type = "Regular Season") {
  cat("üß© Obteniendo tipos de jugadas del jugador (Synergy)...\n")
  
  Sys.sleep(1)
  
  synergy <- nba_api$synergyplaytypes$SynergyPlayTypes(
    player_id = player_id,
    season = season,
    season_type_all_star = season_type,
    player_or_team = "Player"
  )
  
  synergy_df <- py_to_r(synergy$get_data_frames()[[1]])
  cat("‚úÖ Datos de Synergy obtenidos.\n")
  return(synergy_df)
}

```


```{r}
canastas <- get_player_synergy(player_id = 15377, season = "2023-24")
```
